def main():
    # Get input
    x = int(input())
    a = int(input())
    b = int(input())
    # Calculate
    remainder = x - a
    remainder = remainder - (remainder // b) * b
    # Print
    print(remainder)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    # Get input

    b = int(input())

x = int(input())
a = int(input())
b = int(input())

print(x - a - (b * (x - a) // b))


x = int(input())
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
print(x - a - (b * (x - a) // b))
